text:
Costa Cruises’ CostaClub Cruise Departs Amsterdam Sunday, Aug. 23, Honoring the Line’s Most Loyal Guests Published on : Saturday, August 22, 2015
Costa Fortuna is scheduled to depart Amsterdam, Netherlands, Sunday, Aug. 23, on an extraordinary 10-dayCostaClub cruise dedicated to the line’s most loyal guests. The 102,000-ton ship will cruise to the spectacular Norwegian fjords, with a special program featuring Italy’s finest music, cuisine and entertainment.
The Bel Canto -themed cruise will be highlighted by music from popular opera arias performed by Italian soprano Cecilia Gasdia. Gasdia, who has performed in the world’s most famous opera theaters with celebrated directors and conductors, will thrill guests with an exclusive and exciting concert, accompanied on the piano by her sister Elena.
Exquisite Italian cuisine will also hold a place of honor during the cruise. In addition to Costa’s new regional menus, highlighting cuisine from 14 distinct Italian regions, the CostaClub cruise will feature dishes created specially for the occasion by world champion pastry chef Luigi Biasetto. CostaClub members will also enjoy an exclusive buffet featuring famous Setteveli cake and the cascades of Macaron .
There will be plenty of special activities reserved for CostaClub members including flash mobs, gastronomic competitions and singing challenges as well as festivities, cocktail parties, gala evening events and concerts. And, finally, exclusive gifts to celebrate Italian-style.
Source:- Costa Cruises
